data.actual_result: There is only one for the bottom
data.expected_result: There should be two unread buttons, one at the top and the other at the bottom, since both are offscreen
data.short_description: Having no unread channel in sight but having unread channels at the top and at the bottom will only show the unread button at the bottom
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a server with a lot of channels, with all channels marked as read except the very first and the very last one - Scroll to the exact middle of the channel list so you don't see the top nor the bottom unread channel
